<h1 align="center">
  <span style="font-weight:bold;">
  EASIER SAVE 
  </span>
  <br/>
  <a href="https://easiersave.vercel.app/">view website</a>
</h1>

![Demo Gif](https://github.com/cs50victor/personalwebsite/blob/master/src/Assets/gifs/save.gif?raw=true)


<h2>Description</h2>

>This website  allows you to download videos/gif by communicating with an express server, hosted on Heroku, to fetch the media content of the links pasted in the input section. Users can then click or hold down the image thumbnail of the respective video in order to download it.
